issue.title: Language ressource files for the geoviewer
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Language ressource files for the geoviewer are distinct from the standard joomla ones.
They are for the moment embedded in the javascript minified OpenGeo Gxp SDK.

It would be better if they were extract from this minified library and independently accessible to be modify by administrator.

**Fixed versions :** 3.1.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The resource files are now accessible under 
```

administrator/components/com_easysdi_core/libraries/easysdi/js/gxp/locale/
```
